code: import axios from"axios";export var setUserAuthToken=function setUserAuthToken(token){if(token){axios.defaults.headers["x-user-auth-token"]=token;}else{delete axios.defaults.headers["x-user-auth-token"];}};export var setAdminAuthToken=function setAdminAuthToken(token){if(token){axios.defaults.headers["x-admin-auth-token"]=token;}else{delete axios.defaults.headers["x-admin-auth-token"];}};export var setHeader=function setHeader(){return{header:{"Content-Type":"application/json"}};};
